fn.p: Citation Kormuth KA, Lin K, Qian Z, Myerburg MM, Marr LC, Lakdawala SS. 2019. Environmental persistence of influenza viruses is dependent upon virus type and host origin. mSphere 4:e00552-19. https://doi.org/10.1128/mSphere.00552-19.
